mapper.insert: insert into user (id, login_name, name, password, salt, sex, age, phone, user_type, status, organization_id, create_time, path, email) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
login_name,
name,
password,
salt,
sex,
age,
phone,
user_type,
status,
organization_id,
create_time,
path,
email,

mapper.select: select distinct name sname,id id from role
mapper.insert:
insert into user
login_name,
name,
password,
salt,
sex,
age,
phone,
user_type,
status,
organization_id,

mapper.select:
select id,phone from user where 1=1
and phone=#{phone}
mapper.update:
update user set
login_name=#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password=#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt=#{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex=#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age=#{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_type=#{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization_id=#{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
path=#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email=#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
